Formed up in deep blocks, reiter used their firearms in a caracole attack to disorder enemy infantry before charging in to hand-to-hand combat.

This is a Reiter (Riders) unit of twelve strips of one figure each (12 figures total). You will recieve one commander strip (ls06a), one standard bearer (ls06b) and ten rank and file strips (a mix of ls06câ€“g). Bases are not included.

Sculpted by Bob Naismith and cast by D & D Model Cleaning & Casting in lead free pewter.
